20101214023646.000|20101214023648.000|CCO|PRESIDENT OBAMA SIGNED INTO LAW 
20101214023648.000|20101214023650.000|CCO|IN MARCH REQUIRES THAT EVERY 
20101214023650.000|20101214023652.000|CCO|AMERICAN WHO CAN AFFORD IT BUYS 
20101214023652.000|20101214023654.000|CCO|HEALTH INSURANCE.

20101214025410.824|20101214025411.412|CCO|        200MG CELEBREX A DAY
20101214025411.412|20101214025412.000|CCO|      CAN PROVIDE 24 HOUR RELIEF
20101214025412.000|20101214025413.111|CCO|    FOR MANY WITH ARTHRITIS PAIN
